ch0019_90_yuki/0101_0701_01_10:
I was waiting for you to show up,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]!
ch0019_90_yuki/0101_0701_02_10:
I’m fired up and wanna battle someone!
Come on—bring it!
ch0019_90_yuki/7101_0701_01_10:
I’ve been chosen as a Neo Champion, which
means I should be giving others guidance now,
right?
ch0019_90_yuki/7101_0701_02_10:
That’s like what Gym Leaders and Champions do.
Like my dad and Steven!
ch0019_90_yuki/7101_0701_03_10:
In other words, this is the real deal! I’ve got to
try even harder!
ch0019_90_yuki/7102_0701_01_10:
Primal Groudon is a Pokémon with incredible
power within.
ch0019_90_yuki/7102_0701_02_10:
If that power were to be used incorrectly, it could
destroy the world.
ch0019_90_yuki/7102_0701_03_10:
I’ve got to make sure I’m fully aware I’ve such an
incredible partner Pokémon!
ch0019_90_yuki/7103_0701_01_10:
Groudon regains its true form through
Primal Reversion.
ch0019_90_yuki/7103_0701_02_10:
I wonder if we Trainers also have some kind of
power deep within ourselves.
ch0019_90_yuki/7103_0701_03_10:
Maybe if we challenge ourselves to new things,
it’ll awaken unexpected talents!
ch0019_90_yuki/7104_0701_01_10:
Becoming a Neo Champion reminded me why
I want to get stronger.
ch0019_90_yuki/7104_0701_02_10:
It’s because I love Pokémon battles, and competing
against rivals is fun.
ch0019_90_yuki/7104_0701_03_10:
And most importantly, I want to grow even closer
to the Pokémon I love!
ch0019_90_yuki/7105_0701_01_10:
I feel at ease when you’re around,
[Name:PlayerNickname ].
ch0019_90_yuki/7105_0701_02_10:
If I were to go down the wrong path,
you’d stop me, right?
ch0019_90_yuki/7105_0701_03_10:
There’s no such thing as a perfect person or
Pokémon...
ch0019_90_yuki/7105_0701_04_10:
Let’s make sure we’re always honest with
each other—with the good AND the bad!
ch0019_90_yuki/1701_0701_01_10: Nice timing! I have a present for you!
ch0019_90_yuki/1701_0702_01_10: Let’s help each other get even stronger!
ch0019_90_yuki/2501_0701_01_10:
I’m helping Team Magma with their research into
Primal Groudon.
ch0019_90_yuki/2501_0701_02_10:
Reason being, if we figure out the secret to
Primal Groudon’s incredible natural power...
ch0019_90_yuki/2501_0701_03_10:
I’m sure it’ll be useful to both people and
Pokémon!
ch0019_90_yuki/2501_0702_01_10:
I hope research will help me grow closer
to Groudon.
ch0019_90_yuki/2501_0702_02_10:
It’ll also be an opportunity to learn more about my
partner!
ch0019_90_yuki/2511_0701_01_10:
People and Pokémon live their lives while 
borrowing power from nature.
ch0019_90_yuki/2511_0701_02_10:
But it’s not like nature is always our ally.
Sometimes, it may even be a threat.
ch0019_90_yuki/2511_0701_03_10:
That’s something I truly believe, after what
happened back in Hoenn.
ch0019_90_yuki/2511_0702_01_10:
People... Pokémon... Nature... What should we do
to make this world a place where everyone can
be happy?
ch0019_90_yuki/2511_0702_02_10:
It’s our duty is to find the answer—each and
every one of us!
ch0019_90_yuki/3001_0701_01_10:
Morning! We better set a good example for
everyone else with our routine!
ch0019_90_yuki/3003_0701_01_10:
Let’s power through the heat and keep up
the hard work this afternoon!
ch0019_90_yuki/3005_0701_01_10:
Seems like it’s finally cooled down a bit. That
should help us chill out after being so fired up!
